summary_text: Kazuma dropped by Megumin's room one evening to find she had dozed off while folding laundry. Ever the prankster, Kazuma simply could not help himself.
Kazuma's absence from home had stoked cravings for familiar food. With his newly-acquired cooking skill and Aqua's help, he embarked on a quest to make ramen.
Kazuma noticed a pair of magical gloves in Wiz's shop. After hearing about them, he immediately thought up a devious plan...
Kazuma is exhausted after a grueling quest. He decides to take it easy in town when he meets an impossibly sweet and kind heroine.
Aqua was still largely unrecognized as a goddess, irking her to no end. Hoping to remedy this, she began performing good deeds for the denizens of Axel.
Enter Cecily, an ardent steward of the Axis faith. Inspired by her devotion, Aqua vowed to help her dear disciple spread the good word.
After Kazuma refused to loan Aqua any money, she had no choice but to work for a living...
The prize for winning the eating competition is some vintage bubbly, and Aqua is determined to win it for herself!
While walking the streets of Axel, a strange figure approached the gang. Ignoring Darkness and Aqua, the man had but one wish: to take a picture of Megumin.
Having complicated her situation in Axel, Megumin decided it was time for a trip home. There, she reunited with Arue and delighted her little sister Komekko with tales of her adventures.
Megumin was unable to use explosion magic for some reason, causing her mind and body to take a strange turn...
Megumin's attempts to be cute has everyone freaked out. Little do they know that an epic clash of the "cute" and the "cool" has commenced...
Kazuma's party is asked to slay some agile plant-like monsters, but in the heat of battle, Darkness takes an unusual turn...
Chris sought out Darkness with an odd request. She desired the crusader's wisdom...to increase her chest size. Darkness's answer was just as surprising.
While sightseeing in Elroad, Kazuma's party ran into a nobleman mistreating a young woman, which caused Darkness to act...
Darkness hears about Cielo's infamously grueling workout and eagerly asks for a training session to experience it herself.
Having gained infamy as Kazuma's teacher, Chris began an arduous struggle to clear her name.
Chris would never again let Kazuma swipe her undergarments. The incensed thief swore to restore her honor and settle the score.
Chris and Darkness protested against the infamous Cecily of the Eris faith. However, Cecily's words shook Chris to her very core...
Chris is sick of Kazuma stealing her underwear and receives some advice from Melissa. Surely this is the solution to Chris's problem!
Sensing something amiss as Wiz arranged her wares in the shop window, Vanir inquired about the exact effects of the items. Eyes alight, Wiz responded...
Vanir approached Wiz as she worked the shop. Apparently, the latter had sold Aqua a potion with instantly lethal effects.
Wiz's magic item shop found itself in trouble. After Vanir insulted her abilities as a shopkeeper, Wiz took bold action...
Wiz is out of ideas on how to pay this month's rent, but Kazuma has the solution, and it involves an unusual business model!
It seemed Yunyun had at long last made...a friend? A skeptical Arue and Komekko tailed her to uncover the truth.
A solitary Yunyun spied Megumin and her partymates crowded around the dinner table. Too shy to ask to be included, she challenged her long-time "rival" to yet another contest.
Dust and Rin approached Yunyun, who was enjoying a board game alone. She was excited at being asked to help them, but...
Yunyun is playing cards by her lonesome when Mia appears. Yunyun welcomes the adventurous distraction, until...
A delicious yet unfamiliar aroma caught Iris's attention. She followed her nose, leading her to...
Iris silently snuck from the confines of the castle, headed for the town below. She absolutely had to have what Rain was eating earlier.
Iris joined Kazuma's party on a quest. Although jealous of his tales of adventure, there was more to her than meets the eye...
Axel Hearts has come to the capital. Iris is desperate to see their concert in person and slips by Claire and out of the castle.
Another day of spreading the good word lay ahead of Cecily...and no Eris fanatic was going to stop her from making Aqua proud.
Cecily was yet again hard at work converting lost lambs to the Axis faith. Having spotted the priestess from a distance, Megumin quickly hid.
Cecily was once again recruiting for the Order of Axis. The next signature she sought was none other than the easily-swayed Dust's...
Cecily is deep in solemn prayer when Darkness visits her to...observe her radical missionary work?!
One day, Arue was dealing with a difficult case of writer's block when a sudden loud sound shattered the silence outside. She scrambled out the door to find...
Arue and Komekko alerted Yunyun to an alarming development: the two had switched bodies! Talk about crazy conundrums...
Arue couldn't decide how to continue her novel, which meant...she needed a new character! She set out to find inspiration...
Arue gets a new playwriting gig: it is to be a love story for a female audience. She heads into town to find her leads.
Mitsurugi, envious of Kazuma's closeness to Aqua, contrived a scheme to rob Kazuma of his friends.
Mitsurugi challenged Kazuma to yet another showdown. The latter reluctantly accepted, proposing an unconventional method to settle their score.
Mitsurugi encountered the girls of Axel Hearts and decided to save them from the evils of Kazuma Satou!
Mitsurugi is sad to hear Aqua is both hungry and all out of coin. Eager to assist his beloved goddess, he moves to grant her wish.
Having spied Kazuma out and about, Dust deduced the party leader was headed for the infamous succubus shop. Perhaps he could join Kazuma...and get him to foot the bill?
With his attempts to sponge money from Rin having failed miserably, Dust decided to earn his own coin for once and accepted a quest.
Rin had been acting strange recently. In searching for the reason, Dust discovered something surprising...
Dust joins forces with Kazuma's group. An easy job with big rewards falls in their lap, until it all goes wrong!
Once again, Rin had managed to keep Dust away from her wallet. Luna, having seen the exchange, stepped in to offer the deflated adventurer some encouragement.
Once more, Rin put a swift end to Dust's predatory behavior as she always did. That is, until Dust made an uncharacteristically generous offer.
Filling in for Kazuma, Rin set out on a quest alongside Aqua and the others with a spring in her step...
Hoping to cure Dust's terrible money habits, Rin visits visits Melissa, who has an extreme solution.
The girls of Axel Hearts were hard at work brainstorming ways to boost their popularity. They settled on practicing their idol poses.
Surrounded by eccentrics and oddballs, Lia found herself a little fatigued. Cuddling with Konjiro back in her room, she decided on a rather unexpected course of action.
A large number of gifts arrived from the fans of Axel Hearts. One mysterious fan, however, always sends a pink envelope...
Axel Hearts returns from tour. Lia wants to go on a hot springs trip with a "friend," but just who is this mystery companion?!
Droves of fans waited to meet Cielo and company outside the venue. The experience caused Cielo's fear of men to resurface, much to her dismay.
Per his request, Cielo agreed to train Kazuma. This undertaking, however, revealed an unexpected side of the ordinarily meek dancer.
A change came over Cielo quite suddenly. She bumped into a man, but did not strike him. Is her fear of men finally gone?
An arranged marriage is presented to Cielo, but with her fear of men and desire to continue dancing, Kazuma and the others come to the rescue.
The Axel Hearts photo shoot saw the girls breaking off to pose separately...culminating in some unusual fan requests.
Erika visits Wiz's shop and notices a strange potion. It's a magical concoction that can make you cuter, but...
After a show, Erika refused to attend an autograph session. Usually eager to please her fans, her reluctance was quite the mystery...
"Cute" or "cool"? An endless debate rages on between Erika and Megumin. Perhaps a coin flip can decide this once and for all.
Melissa takes a strong interest in Mitsurugi. Sensing he could be useful, she sets out to seduce him...
Kazuma is fed up with Melissa's constant meddling. Hoping to get back at her, he tails her once she departs the guild...
Melissa accompanied Kazuma's party to fight off some monsters. Although a brilliant fighter, she has a rather unusual weakness...
Melissa asks Kazuma and Chris for help on a quest. The two agree, but remain curious as to Melissa's motives...
Mia is in high spirits after accepting a kill quest. At her destination, she finds what appears to be some delicious fruit...
Mia sells vegetables in the town of Axel. However, she has a hard time dealing with customers without Amyâ€™s help...
After gathering vegetables, Mia joined Amy, Kazuma, and company for dinner, but their dessert appeared to have gone missing!
Hawk kites sound super tasty! Mia teams up with Melissa for a quest, and its accompanying prize: dinner!
Amy sells vegetables in the Crimson Demon Village. When sales begin to spike, a certain "devilish little sister" comes calling...
Mia goes out shopping by herself. Amy simply wants to watch from the shadows, but is soon betrayed by her overprotective nature...
Amy was sad after getting into a fight with Mia. Kazuma and the gang attempted to uncover the reason for their falling out...
Amy stands atop a cliff with a grave look on her face. Kazuma rushes to stop her from doing anything drastic, but may also be rushing to conclusions...
A sad voice echoing throughout the castle. That was because of the cruel order Iris gave to Claire?!
After hearing a strange report about Darkness from one of the castle guards, Claire decides to investigate her movements to find out the truth.
Emilia's backstory as a silver-haired half-elf who is a potential heir to her kingdom prompts Megumin to teach her how to properly introduce herself.
Aqua and Kazuma bring Emilia to Arcanretia, where she gives her honest opinion of their friendship.
Rem takes care of Subaru's every need as Kazuma watches their relationship with envy.
After seeing Rem handle Aqua's every need, Darkness makes an unusual request of the ever-helpful maid...
Komekko is in awe of her sister's questing ability. However, the demon Hoost that she has befriended is equally capable...
Komekko bumps into Rin and Dust at the theater in Axel, which is the perfect place to demonstrate her power over grownups.
Komekko takes Hoost with her in order to visit Axel. While wandering the streets, she is stopped by the masked demon...
Komekko accompanies Arue to Axel where they run into Cecily. The priestess is busy with missionary work, revealing a hidden talent within Komekko...
Bell and Liliruca help Kazuma harvest some vegetables, but they soon find out how difficult such work is in this world...
Bell is given a strange tree branch for helping recruit people to the Order of Axis. Elsewhere, Aqua has lost something important...
The quest is a success thanks to Ais's efforts. Darkness feels unfulfilled, however, and has a proposal for Ais.
Ais is told her magic could do with more pizzazz and polish, but will Megumin's passionate tutelage generate the right results?
Kazuma started feeling envious after seeing Albedo and Shalltear's performance compared to that of his own companions, but Ainz tried to explain that it's not quite that simple.
Ainz decided to accept Megumin's challenge to a magic duel! With the pride of these two powerful magic users on the line, an epic showdown began!
With the help of Albedo, Kazuma's party steadily made its way through the snow. But suddenly, they cross paths with an angry Winter Shogun...
Having a hard time feeling like she belonged in Axel, Albedo asked Kazuma for advice. Could his plan to help her establish friendly relations with the residents really work?!
A cool vampire needs a cool pose! Somehow, Shalltear ended up taking lessons in grand introductions from Megumin.
Shalltear decided to help Kazuma's party hunt cabbages to make up for the trouble she caused. All was going well, until they set up camp for the night...
Lolisa approaches Dust with an attractive business proposal. But in such tempting deals, there's always something fishyâ€¦!?
Lolisa and Yunyun head out to explore a dungeon together. The infamous sister appears in front of them all of a suddenâ€¦!?
Whereas the Dancer's show is a huge success, the succubus cafÃ© is empty. After hearing Lolisa's concerns, Kazuma offers to help.
Upon observing Vanir's attitude towards Wiz, Lolisa is filled with a dangerous desire. Dust's comments ignite her passion even further.
Funifura goes out to buy goods for her younger brother who is a fan of Axel Hearts. Dodonko and Yunyun decides to tag along...?
Funifura and Dodonko carries Mel, a professional prankster, on their backs. They are after Megumin on her explosive stroll to get their revenge of the past...
Mikoto is interested in exploring this world's town. Kazuma and this party offer her something in order to take her to a quest.
Mikoto follows Megumin and Kazuma to a slightly high hillâ€¦ But what do you mean Explosion, Explosion, Lalala!?
Judgement will look after the town's safetyâ€¦ A dutiful Kuroko and Yunyun will supervise the villagers of Axel Town!
Kuroko is surprised at Saten who is collecting rumors even far from home. But today's is different. Flyingâ€¦ vegetables!?
Accelerator visits a crowded restaurant with Last Order. He finds a strangely empty spot while looking for a place to sit.
Accelerator is looking for Last Order who is missing in action. Kazuma and his party seem to know their whereaboutsâ€¦!?
Aqua and the others talk to Misaka Sister at the restaurant. But the people from this world still can't tell the difference between Misaka Sister and real Misaka.
Kazuma's party is looking for Last Order. Misaka Sister uses a certain method to specify Last Order's whereabouts.
Kazuma and Naofumi's parties go on a bounty quest together. The quest is easily completed thanks to Naofumi, but Darkness seems unhappy about something...
Kazuma hears a suspicious metal sound in the middle of the night. The sound was coming from Naofumi. What is he making...?
Aqua and the others hold a girls' night out with Raphtalia. They ask about Raphtalia's relationship with Naofumi... and find out something unexpected about Raphtalia.
Raphtalia and Filo quarrel over Naofumi. Aqua proposes a way to settle the dispute which is...  harvesting cabbages!?
Filo and Komekko end up going on a food hunt. What kind of ingredients will they get...?
Kazuma's party ride on a carriage pulled by Filo. There, Kazuma comes up with an awesome way for Naofumi's party to earn living expenses.
Maple and her friends are enjoying the street food in Axel. When they were told that they eat too much, they decide to go on a quest to exerciseâ€¦
Darkness and Maple bond over their shared role as frontmen. After conversing, they decide to go on a quest togetherâ€¦?
Sally, Kazuma, and Chris go on a quest together. Sally finds something about them after observing them carefully.
After quickly completing their quest, Sally and the others camp for the night. However, Sally has trouble falling asleep and Kazuma becomes concernedâ€¦
Due to Kazuma's interest in antiques, he becomes intrigued by Kasumi's sword. Then he finds out that the sword's name is Chun Chun Maruâ€¦.
Darkness and others visit a training Kasumi. It seems like they're here to learn how to hit accurately.
After seeing Aqua's Nature's Beauty, Rudeus is impressed with her skills. However, he was also as handy as Aquaâ€¦
Roxy and Rudeus joins Kazumaâ€™s party to raid a Running Hawkite together. The two of them are taken aback with the Hawkiteâ€™s strange ecologyâ€¦
Roxy and the others join Megumin on her explosive stroll. What score will Roxyâ€™s explosion magic getâ€¦?
For Roxyâ€™s welcoming party, they arrive at Arcanretia, but believers of Axis refer to Roxy as their allyâ€¦
The members go on a quest to raid an Orc for the lively Eris. However, the Orc was much more powerful than what Rudeus expectedâ€¦
Iris listens to Erisâ€™ story with interest. However, Rudeus and Kazuma start arguing about something incredibleâ€¦
Subaru is taken aback because Kazuma died during a quest, but Aqua and the rest of the party members act as if it's ordinaryâ€¦
Subaruâ€™s party is working hard at the beach. However, this worldâ€™s hard work is unusual.
Ram greets Subaru returning after harvesting sweet potatoes. Despite her harsh attitude, it looks like she's about to cook for himâ€¦?
Ram treats Subaru badly as she usually does. After seeing it, Darkness says sheâ€™s jealous.
Beatrice, who came to Arcanretia, hears how awesome the Order of Axis is from Cecily, who likes pretty girlsâ€¦
Puck that Beatrice likes and Chomusuke, Meguminâ€™s familiar spirit. Who is cuter? The competition starts now.
Subaruâ€™s party is practicing the Crimson Demonâ€™s introduction while learning from Megumin. Echidna is watching them with interestâ€¦
Emilia's party is playing â€œBeach Volleyballâ€ on the beach. Echidna watches them closely.
Suddenly, Zesta peeks under Erikaâ€™s skirt. But Zesta had an idea, and he didn't know if it was shallow or deep.
Zesta and Cecily, zealous Axis Followers. They talk about when they were enlightened with the truth in the past.
Kyon and Kazuma go through each of their hardships. After talking about what they went through, they want to get some fresh air.
Kyon is asked to go on a quest in Kazumaâ€™s place. He has no choice but to go with them due to Haruhiâ€™s orders.
Haruhi becomes fond of Aqua and recruits her to the SOS Brigade. Aqua ends up going with Haruhi, and this was the beginning of a tragedy.
Haruhi tells people around her that she wants to defeat a strong enemy. Kazuma tries to come up with an excuse to refuse, but...
Megumin challenges Nagato to a magic duel because she thinks of her as a rival. Right when the battle was about to begin, it was interrupted by someone unexpected.
Kyonâ€™s party gets tour of Axel from Darkness. Nagato becomes interested in the smell coming from a shop.
Haruhiâ€™s party goes on a Dire Bunny raid quest. Mikuru tries to fight despite being scared...
Mikuru got a job at the guild restaurant. Will the clumsy Mikuru be able to do a good job?
Rimuru wants to know more about the Demon Lord of this world. Rimuru visits Wiz's Item shop, but Wiz is being scolded Vanir...
Rimuru is the leader of a nation, but Kazuma's party doesn't believe that. They go on a quest together to clear the suspicion.
Rimuru makes a man's promise with Kazuma and Dust. Shuna was standing behind them with a smile...
Shuna serves Rimuru even in this world. Kazuma lets out a deep sigh as he compares her and Darkness.
Shion is angered by how close Rimuru and Kazuma became. To capture Rimuru's heart, she asks Megumin and Darkness for their cooperation.
Shion is agitated when Rimuru goes out with Shuna. To show her value as his secretary and bodyguard, Shion stands in the kitchen.
Milim and Megumin unites with the same outfit. Then Yunyun comes to challenge them to a duel as usual...?
The nature around the village is destroyed due to Milim. Kazuma and Aqua tries to take Milim, the cause of the damage, to the guild.
Cid and Darkness participates in a swordsmanship competition held in the Royal Capital. Whether if it's fortunate or not, the two of them face each other at the beginning...
Cid, Megumin, and Yunyun receives a raid quest. The one who came to replace Cid who pathetically ran away is...?
Alpha receives information on a strange person in the forest. She goes with Megumin, the source of the information, and Yunyun to check it out.
Shadow and Alpha discuss their future plans in secret. But Yunyun coincidentally witnesses it...?
Kazuma and Darkness hears about Beta's spy activity. After hearing that she uses her beauty as one of the methods, Kazuma...
Aqua asks Beta write her biography. She takes Kazuma and Beta on a quest to show off her capabilities but...?
Kazumaâ€™s party decides to take a picture to celebrate their time in Tokyo. To Aqua, who is trying to decide how to take the picture, Kazuma...
Aqua wearing a fantastical outfit. It gives off a sublime atmosphere, but the inside is the same.
Kazumaâ€™s party decides to share each other their crepes. Megumin also offers Kazuma a bite of her crepe...
Kazumaâ€™s party arrives at the observatory. Compared to Darkness, who is moved by the beautiful night view, Kazuma acts like his usual self...
Darkness wearing a fantastical outfit. While feeling the overflowing power, the beastly exposure doesn't stop the delusions.
Kazumaâ€™s party goes shopping. The excited Wiz takes out a single card...
Kazuma arrives at the theme park with Yunyun and Megumin. After getting dizzy while riding the rotating coffee cup ride, Yunyun asks Kazuma for help...
Iris puts on a fantastic outfit. With the overflowing power, she thinks this is the chance to repay Darkness but...?
Mel is looking to redecorate her new abode. In order to do so, she asks her friends for their opinions...
Mel accompanies Kazuma and the others to Arcanretia, blissfully ignorant of the danger that awaits her at this beautiful city...
Mel is eager to take on a high-difficulty quest to prove her abilities to the group when someone makes her an intriguing proposal...
With the festival approaching, Mel is eager to pull some pranks... But her plan is rejected by Kazuma, meaning she needs to come up with a new skill!
Aqua bursts into Wiz's magic item shop, furious about a recent purchase. Will Vanir be able to calm this unruly customer?!
Vanir bans Wiz from looking after the shop due to the trouble she causes, but will her replacements be any better?
There are no cabbages this year?! Hearing of Kazuma and the others' despair at the shortage, the masked demon steps up!
Convinced the shop is doomed with Wiz in charge, Vanir conducts some market research to find a product that will turn their fortunes around.
